Stellar Manufacturing Holiday Schedule:

November:

11/25 - 11/27 Monday - Wednesday: All Business Operations Open. Hard close 11/27 at 2:30PM for Shipping and Receiving. 

11/28 Thursday- Thanksgiving: All Business Operations Closed.

11/29 Friday - Day After Thanksgiving: All Business Operations Closed. 

December/January

12/23 - 12/24 Monday & Tuesday: All Business Operations Open. Hard close 12/23 at 2:30PM for Shipping and Receiving. 

12/25 Wednesday - Holiday.  All Business Operations Closed.

12/26 Thursday - Forced Close. PRODUCTION, SHIPPING & RECEIVING. Production Planning & Inventory Team will be in office.

12/27 Friday - Forced Close. PRODUCTION, SHIPPING & RECEIVING. Production Planning & Inventory Team will be in office.

12/30 Monday - Forced Close. PRODUCTION, SHIPPING & RECEIVING. Production Planning & Inventory Team will be in office. 

12/31 Tuesday - Forced Close. PRODUCTION, SHIPPING & RECEIVING. Production Planning & Inventory Team will be in office. 

1/1 Wednesday - Holiday.  All Business Operations Closed.

1/2 Thursday - All Business Operations Open. 

1/3 Friday - All Business Operations Open.
